item.title: Post attack analyses ZedCorp Challenge - My name is Rookie
item.description: The ZedCorp challenge alias “My name is Rookie” was a realistic challenge proposed at Hacklab ESGI CTF 2019. ZedCorp is a small startup who work in computer science and particulary in development. The goal was to recover confidential files owned by the CEO. For this recap, I want to do some analyses on my challenge to know how challengers proceed to solve it. There is some fun facts :D You can read writeups here to understand the context :

item.title: [CTF - Hacklab-ESGI-2019] ZedCorp Challenge - My name is Rookie
item.description: The ZedCorp challenge alias “My name is Rookie” was a realistic challenge proposed at Hacklab ESGI CTF 2019. ZedCorp is a small startup who work in computer science and particulary in development. The goal was to recover confidential files owned by the CEO. For this challenge, I wanted to teach challengers the principle of SSH tunneling and basics of penetration testing. Writeups wrote by others challengers (too many writeups you are mad <3) :
